overview: An original and very personal tribute to Llorenç Llobet-Gràcia, author of one of the indisputable cult movies in Spanish cinema: Vida en sombras. The film is presented as a search, like the wanderings of a character that, compelled by the images from Llobet-Gràcia’s movies, will go on to discover the cinematic and personal landscape of this filmmaker from Sabadell.
title: El cor del pi negre
